column4: I installed the package, My xorg.conf is empty currently, I have a working xorg.conf from xubuntu into other partition, should I copy it and run startx ?
I installed the package, My xorg.conf is empty currently, I have a working xorg.conf from xubuntu into other partition, should I copy it and run startx ?
sure. Xorg should autodetect and run fine with a blank xorg.conf, but if you have stuff you want it to use, go ahead.
When I run startx with blank xorg, it gives me a better resolution in the console, but I cant type any command there, why ?
